mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'a fair weather friend' refer to?

options.a: A person who is reliable in difficult times
options.b: A person who is only a friend in good times
options.c: A friend who enjoys outdoor activities
options.d: A person who predicts the weather accurately

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'a fair weather friend' refers to someone who is supportive and friendly only when it is easy and convenient to do so, not in times of trouble.
